questions.question: The Indus Valley Civilization flourished around:
questions.explanation: The Indus Valley Civilization flourished from approximately 3300 to 1300 BCE

questions.question: Harappa and Mohenjo-daro were major cities of:
questions.explanation: Harappa and Mohenjo-daro were major urban centers of the Indus Valley Civilization

questions.question: The Vedas were composed in:
questions.explanation: The Vedas were composed in Sanskrit, the ancient Indo-Aryan language

questions.question: Chandragupta Maurya founded the Mauryan Empire in:
questions.explanation: Chandragupta Maurya founded the Mauryan Empire around 321 BCE
